**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 593 4.0 **Usage** held in 1 hand --- Semiprecious gemstones emerge, seemingly at random, from the surface of this gnarled wooden staff. While wielding it, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to checks to identify divination magic. **Craft Requirements** Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells. Staff of Divination **Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 594 4.0 **Price** 230 gp **Bulk** 1 ---
  • **Cantrip** [_detect magic_](/Spells.aspx?ID=66)
  • **1st** [_true strike_](/Spells.aspx?ID=345)
  • **2nd** [_comprehend language_](/Spells.aspx?ID=46), [_darkvision_](/Spells.aspx?ID=60), [_see invisibility_](/Spells.aspx?ID=271)
Staff of Divination (Greater) **Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 594 4.0 **Price** 900 gp **Bulk** 1 ---
  • **3rd** [_clairaudience_](/Spells.aspx?ID=39), _darkvision_
  • **4th** [_clairvoyance_](/Spells.aspx?ID=40), _comprehend language_, [_telepathy_](/Spells.aspx?ID=337)
Staff of Divination (Major) **Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 594 4.0 **Price** 4,000 gp **Bulk** 1 ---
  • **5th** [_prying eye_](/Spells.aspx?ID=239), [_sending_](/Spells.aspx?ID=272)
  • **6th** _telepathy_, [_true seeing_](/Spells.aspx?ID=344)
name: Staff of Divination (Major)
